Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

Class ClientManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Client.ClientManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllableByServerMessage, Observer<MessageToServer>
public class ClientManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllableByServerMessage, Observer<MessageToServer>
This class is the link between client and the server All messages received from the server are handled here and there are all the updates to the ClientModel All messages generated by the client are sent to the server through the sendToServer() method
